name: Lunar Lander (itch) (IndigoRaccoon)
description:
Maneuver your Lander through 9 stages of increasingly difficult terrain in low gravity!

Time and efficiency oriented game modes are also available for additional challenge.

Notice: In case of black screen bug, try refreshing the page or downloading the game.

Controls

Left click - Thrusters
Right click or R - Restart level
Middle click or P - Pause menu
